oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colt Army Revolver of James Chamberlain Jones Beene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Colt .44 Army revolver which belonged to James Chamberlain Jones Beene, Co. A, 34th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Beene was from South Pittsburg, Tenn. He was wounded at the Battle of Murfreesboro, Tenn., Dec. 31, 1862. He was captured July 11, 1864; at Bridgeport, Ala. and sent to Point Lookout, Md. and charged with murder. He was exchanged March 18, 1865. He was born in Sept. 1844 and died in 1913. He married Tennessee Eugenia Cotname October 1, 1865.
